sentences.en: ‘So Bill’s leaving her?’ ‘ So it seems (= that seems to be true ) .’
sentences.cn: “这么说来，比尔要离开她？”“好像是这样。”

sentences.en: "Fewter didn't seem to think so." — "Never mind what Fewter said."
sentences.cn: “菲特似乎不是这么想的。”——“别去管菲特怎么说。”

sentences.en: All of you seem to have gone through hell making this record.
sentences.cn: 为了灌制这张唱片你们大家似乎都经历了重重波折。

sentences.en: Daydreams may seem to be rehearsals for real-life situations.
sentences.cn: 白日梦可能像是真实情景的预演。

sentences.en: Don't be faint-hearted when things seem a bit slow or boring.
sentences.cn: 事情变得有点沉闷无聊的时候，不要胆怯。

sentences.en: For the time being, the liberals seem to have carried the day.
sentences.cn: 眼下似乎是自由主义者占据了上风。

sentences.en: He rubbed and rubbed but couldn't seem to get clean.
sentences.cn: 他擦了又擦，可就是擦不干净。

sentences.en: I've quite forgotten how closed in London can seem.
sentences.cn: 我都快忘了，伦敦有时看上去会多么地闭塞。

sentences.en: It seems a foolish decision now.
sentences.cn: 现在看来这是一个愚蠢的决定。

sentences.en: It seems like you’re catching a cold, Taylor.
Most consumers seem unconvinced that the recession is over.
sentences.cn: 大多数消费者似乎都不相信经济衰退已经过去。

sentences.en: T-shirts now seem almost de rigueur in the West End.
sentences.cn: T恤衫现在几乎成了伦敦西区时尚人士的必备之物。

sentences.en: The idea of spending two weeks with him may seem heavenly.
sentences.cn: 和他一起度过两周的想法听起来似乎十分美好。

sentences.en: The ideas seem sketchily developed, the textures thin, the images vague.
sentences.cn: 观点阐述不充分，结构单薄，意象也模糊不清。

sentences.en: The pedals seem a bit off-centre and the clutch is rather stiff.
sentences.cn: 踏板似乎有点偏心，离合器也相当紧。

sentences.en: This description didn't seem to tally with what we saw.
sentences.cn: 这一描述似乎与我们目睹的情况不符。

sentences.en: Victorian houses can seem cold with their lofty ceilings and rambling rooms.
sentences.cn: 维多利亚式房屋屋顶高耸，房间布局凌乱，因此可能会显得较为阴冷。

sentences.en: You seem in rather a hurry to get rid of me.
sentences.cn: 看起来你急于想摆脱我。

phrases.tran_cn: 看起来像；看上去像…；好像…

trans.tran_en: if something seems to be true, there are qualities or facts that make people think it is true
